data.eml:eml: Securicauda hermani and Carinacauda stormi, two new genera and species of slug from the Pacific Northwest of the United States (Gastropoda: Stylommatophora: Arionidae), with notes on Gliabates oregonius Webb 1959

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Leonard, William P., Chichester, Lyle, Richart, Casey H., Young, Tiffany A. (2011): Securicauda hermani and Carinacauda stormi, two new genera and species of slug from the Pacific Northwest of the United States (Gastropoda: Stylommatophora: Arionidae), with notes on Gliabates oregonius Webb 1959. Zootaxa 2746: 43-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.276654
